mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT M.M_NAME , SUM(OD.O_QTY) "cnt" , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(OD.O_QTY) DESC) "rank" FROM ORDER_DETAILS OD JOIN ORDERS O ON O.O_NUM = OD.O_NUM JOIN MENU M ON OD.M_NUM = M.M_NUM WHERE O.S_ID = #{sId} AND O.DELIVERY_STATUS IN ('C3','C5') AND OD.CA_NUM IN ('CACO','CADR','CADE') AND TO_CHAR(O.O_DATE,'YYYY/MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD') + 1 ,'YYYY/MM') GROUP BY M.M_NUM, M.M_NAME ) MENURANK WHERE MENURANK."rank" < 4

SELECT * FROM( SELECT S.ST_NAME "stName" , S.ST_UNIT "stUnit" , ABS(SUM(W.WARE_QTY)) "stQty" , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ABS(SUM(W.WARE_QTY)) DESC) "rank" FROM STOCK S JOIN STOREOPEN SOP ON S.S_ID = SOP.S_ID AND TO_CHAR(OPENTIME,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') JOIN WAREHOUSING W ON S.ST_NUM = W.ST_NUM WHERE W.WARE_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT MAX(OPENTIME) FROM STOREOPEN) AND NVL(SOP.CLOSETIME,SYSTIMESTAMP) AND S.S_ID = #{sId} AND (W.WARE_QTY < 0 OR W.ST_LOSS < 0) GROUP BY S.ST_NAME, S.STAN_UNIT, S.ST_UNIT) STOCKRANK WHERE STOCKRANK."rank" < 4

SELECT NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN TOTAL>0 THEN TOTAL*0.01 ELSE 0 END),0) "addmileage" , NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN MILEAGE>0 THEN MILEAGE ELSE NULL END),0) "mileage" FROM ORDERS O JOIN STOREOPEN SOP ON O.S_ID = SOP.S_ID AND TO_CHAR(OPENTIME,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') WHERE O.O_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT MAX(OPENTIME) FROM STOREOPEN) AND NVL(SOP.CLOSETIME,SYSTIMESTAMP) AND O.S_ID = #{sId} AND DELIVERY_STATUS IN ('C3','C5')
